title: Collaborative Learning Program for Developmental Nursing Care of Infants Undergoing Congenital Heart Disease Surgery

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing knowledge and foundational understanding of cardiovascular anatomy
context.additional_context: Hybrid course combining VR simulations and BYOD-based activities in collaborative learning environments, emphasizing enhanced field applicability through multidisciplinary approaches

learning_goals: Perform simulation scenarios applying pain management protocols in CICU settings with 90% accuracy.
Collaborate with interdisciplinary team members to develop infant developmental nursing intervention plans in VR-based environments.
Apply family-centered nursing coordination strategies to real cases, achieving over 80% participation rates.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
